page.title: 10Auchtydonald Farm
page.content: { Mr Davidson }puts in an average of{48 hours a week.He has three workers.He has a big bale straw burner which he uses for drying grain and central heating.It was the first of its kind in {Scotland.} His potatoes are sieved on a{55 mm sieve.The smaller ones are sold in { {England}for seed,the big ones are sold to the public for eating. {Mr Davidson}is particularly interested in conservation.He tries to keep hedges and the habitats of animals.He has planted a few hedges and plants {1000}mixed trees a year for shelter and amenity. Each year he pays casual labourers to pick raspberries,strawberries and potatoes.
